definition: (classical) this, that/he, she, they/(exclamatory final particle)/(initial particle, introduces an opinion)

sentences.english: The content of allantoin in Rhizoma Dioscoreae was determine by HPLC method.

sentences.english: A macrobiotic diet consists mainly of whole grain and certain kinds of vegetables.

sentences.english: I will take this wheat bran home to feed the chickens.
